name: Coco Box S
description: The Coco Box Small is feminine and elegant with its quilted details. Available in other sizes and finishes. Handmade; Pen Shell & Bronze-Patina Brass, wood veneer interior. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines. All shagreen-covered items should be kept out of direct sunlight, color variants may occur on the stingray and other exotic finishes, but this showcases the Parisian label's commitment to creating authentic luxurious products using natural components.
